comment: We were going to avoid social media on January , but we have had a superior idea . From am until pm , we will post no words . Only pictures of the EU flag . If enough follow suit , this should cause at least three racist aneurysms and a dozen or so coronaries . <URL>
amr:
# ::snt We were going to avoid social media on January , but we have had a superior idea . From am until pm , we will post no words . Only pictures of the EU flag . If enough follow suit , this should cause at least three racist aneurysms and a dozen or so coronaries . <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (a / avoid-01
                  :ARG0 (w / we)
                  :ARG1 (m2 / media
                        :mod (s / social))
                  :time (d / date-entity
                        :month 1))
            :ARG2 (h / have-03
                  :ARG0 w
                  :ARG1 (ii / idea
                        :ARG1-of (s2 / superior-01))))
      :snt2 (p / post-01
            :ARG0 (w2 / we)
            :ARG1 (w3 / word
                  :polarity -)
            :time (d2 / date-interval
                  :op1 (d3 / date-entity
                        :time "18:00")
                  :op2 (p2 / picture
                        :mod (o / only)
                        :topic (f / flag
                              :mod (o2 / organization
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "EU"))))))
      :snt3 (h2 / have-condition-91
            :ARG1 (p3 / probable
                  :domain (c2 / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (t / this)
                        :ARG1 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (a3 / aneurysm
                                    :mod (r / racist)
                                    :quant (a4 / at-least
                                          :op1 3))
                              :op2 (c3 / coronary
                                    :quant (a5 / at-least
                                          :op1 12)))))
            :ARG2 (f2 / follow-suit-06
                  :ARG1-of (h3 / have-quant-91
                        :ARG3 (e / enough)))))

comment: It is decided . January is hereby designated Blue Flag Day . For me , anyway .
